claim: Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older
explanation: The image is a portion of the full prescribing information for Flublok, including the “INDICATIONS AND USAGE” section. In that section it clearly states “Flublok is approved for use in persons 18 years of age and older,” which directly corroborates the claim that Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older.
